Title: Teacher's Pet
Plot: While Xander and most of the male population of Sunnydale High fall for the beautiful substitute science teacher Miss French, Buffy is not so sure about her intentions.
GuestStars: Karim Oliver, Michael Ross Verona, Jack Knight, William Monaghan, Ken Lerner, Musetta Vander, Jackson Price, Jean Speegle Howard, David Boreanaz
